usage: eosrift [--config <path>] <command> [args]

commands:
  http      start an HTTP tunnel
  tcp       start a TCP tunnel
  tls       start a TLS tunnel
  start     start tunnels from config
  config    manage client config
  version   print version information
  help      show help

environment:
  EOSRIFT_CONFIG        config path override
  EOSRIFT_SERVER_ADDR   server base address (recommended)
  EOSRIFT_CONTROL_URL   legacy: full ws(s) control URL
  EOSRIFT_AUTHTOKEN     client auth token
  EOSRIFT_INSPECT_ADDR  local inspector listen address

examples:
  eosrift config add-authtoken <token>
  eosrift config set-server https://eosrift.com
  eosrift config set-host-header rewrite
  eosrift start --all
  eosrift http 8080 --server https://eosrift.com
  eosrift http 3000 --domain demo.tunnel.eosrift.com
  eosrift http 3000 --subdomain demo
  eosrift tcp  5432 --server https://eosrift.com
  eosrift tls  443  --server https://eosrift.com
